channel.title: 64bit run.bat?
channel.description:
ok so i made my 64 bit run.bat for my friend looks like this @echo off title CLient java -Xmx500m -cp .;./bin; EGUI
but when ever he clicks login it says error connecting to server and ive already put my ip or host or whatever in the client and its on the right port?????

item.title: 64bit run.bat?

item.description:
@ug1yw4t3rm3l0n wrote:

tinyurl.com/ythehell64

Thats my 64 bit start, just tell him to edit the cmd to his version of java.

item.title: 64bit run.bat?
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

ok so i made my 64 bit run.bat for my friend looks like this
@echo off
title CLient
java -Xmx500m -cp .;./bin; EGUI

but when ever he clicks login it says error connecting to server and ive already put my ip or host or whatever in the client and its on the right port???

Read full topic
